name: GUIDE - Global Universities in Distance Education
display_name: GUIDE - Global Universities in Distance Education
description: The Association GUIDE – Global Universities In Distance Education was founded in 2005 by Università degli Studi Guglielmo Marconi with the aim to develop and support international cooperation and open and distance learning worldwide. Its mission is to promote excellence in research, development and use of e-learning by providing networking and exchange opportunities among universities and educational institutions, funding agencies, public and private bodies and the business sector. The Association is currently joined by more than 110 universities sharing the common goal to modernize higher education systems through the use of new technologies.
